Card.Name: Harding Manor's Stables
Card.Description: The nobility of the manor are very rude about Lex being a wizard, so he settles for spending the night with their horses - without permission, of course. Since Lex has the Massive Metal Key, he finds gold hidden in a storage room. +6 Points
Card.Mechanics: Plus 6 Points. Week: Special(Massive Metal Key)

Card.Name: A Strange Note
Card.Description: A mysterious note floats down to Lex off of a chilling breeze. On it are the words scrawled: "Curiosity killed the cat."
Card.Mechanics: Plus 5 Points

Card.Name: Clear The Path
Card.Description: With a flourish of his wand, trees make way and thistles monsters retreat. Lex moves to a random terrain. +2 Magic
Card.Mechanics: Random Terrain +2 Magic

Card.Name: Common Magical Plants
Card.Description: These magical plants will be delicious if Lex grows them completely. +1 Point per day phase until moved terrain
Card.Mechanics: Until moved terrain, +1 point per day phase

Card.Name: Esoteric Palmist
Card.Description: Lex meets a palmist willing to give him secrets of the future.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, +4 Magic

Card.Name: Everlasting Lantern
Card.Description: Lex finds a lantern that just doesn't seem to want to go out, making it possible to burn cards during the night.
Card.Mechanics: Enables burning cards during the next night phase

Card.Name: Knight's Regimen
Card.Description: The knight who wrote this didn't have a lot to say, but Lex gleans what he can. Draw a card.
Card.Mechanics: Draw a card

Card.Name: Gaseous Release
Card.Description: Swamp gas is more flammable than Lex realized! His eyebrows may be gone, but at least he landed outside the Swamp.
Card.Mechanics: Lose 2 Points, Plus 4 Magic, move to random terrain

Card.Name: Magic Broomstick
Card.Description: Lex finds a magic flying broomstick that proves to be difficult to control.
Card.Mechanics: Can't lose points until next morning phase. 20< Draw a card

Card.Name: Massive Metal Key
Card.Description: You can only wonder what door this might open.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Points. Add "Harding Manor Stables" to Lex deck

Card.Name: Path to the Cave
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Caves!
Card.Mechanics: Move to Cave. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Path to the Forest
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Forest!
Card.Mechanics: Move to Forest. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Path to the Hills
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Hills!
Card.Mechanics: Move to Hills. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Path to the Swamp
Card.Description: Lex finds himself in the Swamp!
Card.Mechanics: Move to Swamp. Do not move randomly at end of day.

Card.Name: Polite Kettle
Card.Description: A kettle that informs its owner politely when its water is boiling. A fine addition to any household.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Points

Card.Name: Tattered Tent
Card.Description: Lex has found a tattered, yet surprisingly protective, tent. The Wild's will not harm him for a time.
Card.Mechanics: Skip the AI's turn this day phase

Card.Name: Warding Spirits
Card.Description: The apparition Lex summons says it will keep watch. At the very least, it makes him feel better.
Card.Mechanics: Plus 2 Magic, plus 2 Points

Card.Name: Well-Kept House
Card.Description: This house is much too clean to be abandoned, but nobody's home!
Card.Mechanics: Cant be burned. +5 Points. Add "Well Kept House Owner's Return" to AI deck

Card.Name: Love Letter
Card.Description: Lex has found a note, hidden away in his pack- he wonder who it could be from?
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue: The note is from Sis. She wishes him well, says she misses him, but also has written a poem: "cryptic advice for a card choice", +2 Points

Card.Name: Abandoned Log Cabin
Card.Description: If Lex has 15 or more magic, he finds some tasty mushrooms that have grown overnight. +2 Magic
Card.Mechanics: 15< +2 Magic

Card.Name: Hedge Witch's Hut
Card.Description: If Magic is less than 20, Lex draws 2 cards. If Magic is more than 20, Lex gains +5 Magic
Card.Mechanics: 20> Draw 2 cards, 20< +5 Magic

Card.Name: Ser Ludlow's Introduction to Alchemy
Card.Description: The most streamlined introductory text to date, and a staple part of any alchemist’s education. Lex spends some time brushing up on the basics. Lex Discards his hand. +3 Magic.
Card.Mechanics: Discard hand, +3 Magic

Card.Name: The Wily Merchant Gaspard
Card.Description: Lex is approached by a suspiciously eloquent merchant on his travels.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence. 50% Chance Draw two cards & +1 Point // 50% -3 Points

Card.Name: Unicorn Hair
Card.Description: The thin, silvery strand wraps around his wand and guides his way.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, draw up to full

Card.Name: Grandpa Bark
Card.Description: Lex encounters an old talking tree on a hill who asks him for a favor.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, Plus 6 points

Card.Name: Hidden Path
Card.Description: Poking around pays off when a small path reveals itself. +4 points Lex moves to a random terrain.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain, +4 Points

Card.Name: Magic Chest
Card.Description: Lex draws until hand is full and gains 2 points for each card drawn this way. If lex has more than 30 magic, he gains 2 magic per card instead.
Card.Mechanics: Draw until full. 30 Magic> +2 Points for each card drawn. 30 Magic< +2 Magic for each card drawn.

Card.Name: Meatcleaver Moira's Moist Meat Market
Card.Description: A petite young woman greets Lex, grins dazzlingly, and expertly stabs a knife into a red mass. "The most moist meat around!"
Card.Mechanics: CHOOSE: -4 Points, Enables burning cards during next night phase /OR/ Draw 2 cards

Card.Name: Naughty Knickers
Card.Description: Lex finds, hidden away, something soft and lacy, and promptly faints of embarrassment.
Card.Mechanics: Skip a day phase, draw a card, +3 Magic

Card.Name: Concealed Cave Passage
Card.Description: The cave can be confusing, and Lex gets lost, eventually finding his way out of the caves. Lex moves to a random terrain, -4 Points.
Card.Mechanics: Move to random terrain. -4 Points

Card.Name: Qilin Lake
Card.Description: Lex finds a beautiful lake guarded by a lone dragon. The dragon offers a drink in exchange for some gold. If Lex chooses to give a gift to Qilin, he loses 10 points and gains 10 magic. If not, nothing happens.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger dialogue sequence, CHOOSE:-10 Points, +10 Magic /OR/ Nothing

Card.Name: Sage Tree Ghost
Card.Description: The spirit takes pity on Lex's inexperience in magic. +3 Magic If magic is less than 25, +6 Magic instead
Card.Mechanics: 25 Magic > +6 Magic, 25 Magic < +3 Magic

Card.Name: Shrouding Mists
Card.Description: Lex is overtaken by a heavy mist and finds he is missing something once out the other side. Lex discards one card and draws two cards.
Card.Mechanics: Discard one card, draw two cards

Card.Name: Winding Tunnels
Card.Description: Lex cannot leave the terrain until the next morning phase but finds some valuable gems in the cave’s crystals. +3 Points
Card.Mechanics: Cannot leave terrain until next morning phase. +3 Points

Card.Name: A Fork in the Road
Card.Description: Irony dictates that the first choice is the wrong one.
Card.Mechanics: Return to previous terrain (TO BE EDITED)

Card.Name: A Mighty Gust
Card.Description: A heavy gust of wind bombards Lex in his travels, scattering his things into the dark. -3 points and Lex’s hand is discarded, giving him only magic
Card.Mechanics: -3 points and Lex’s hand is discarded, giving him only magic

Card.Name: Abandoned House
Card.Description: An old hag claiming to be Lex’s Grandmother tries to eat him, but he escapes. Lex discards his hand and draws three cards. -4 Points
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, Discard hand then draw three cards, -4 Points

Card.Name: Ancient Rusted Sword
Card.Description: Lex finds an old, rusted sword hidden among the rubble of an old temple.
Card.Mechanics: Magic 25< +3 Magic, Magic 25> -3 Points and add another Gwyllgi Attack to the deck

Card.Name: Bandit Camp
Card.Description: Lex accidentally stumbles upon a bandit camp in his travels. 20% Lex is attacked! -4 Points, and must stay in the terrain to heal until the next morning phase. OR 30% Lex conjures a thick fog as cover, and steals from the bandits amidst the confusion. +4 points OR 50% Lex flees as soon as he sees a bandit sneer. Move to a random terrain.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, 20% -4 Points, cannot move terrain next day phase OR 30% +4 Points OR 50% Move to a random terrain

Card.Name: Bat Colony
Card.Description: Lex accidentally disturbs a colony of bats and is swarmed by the angry creatures. He loses 5 points.
Card.Mechanics: -5 Points

Card.Name: Cynocephali Merchants
Card.Description: Lex meets some kind but awfully chatty dog-headed people. They insist on asking him of his travels...
Card.Mechanics: 50% Chance +3 magic OR -3 points, Trigger Dialogue Sequence

Card.Name: Drekavac
Card.Description: Lex encounters a Drekavac which scares him into paralysis. -12 points.
Card.Mechanics: -12 Points

Card.Name: End of the Path
Card.Description: Lex discards a card. If his magic is more than 20, he discards two cards instead.
Card.Mechanics: 20 Magic> Discard 1 card, 20 Magic< Discard 2 cards

Card.Name: Heavy Rain
Card.Description: It is too dangerous to travel during a sudden rainstorm. Lex cannot change terrain next day phase, loses 3 points and discards a card.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain, -3 Points, Discard a card

Card.Name: Incredibly Hungry
Card.Description: Lex has run out of water being in the swamp for too long and must find something to eat. -2 points per day phase until Lex has left the swamp.
Card.Mechanics: -2 Points for each following consecutive day phase spent in a swamp

Card.Name: Incredibly Thirsty
Card.Description: Lex has run out of water being in the hills for too long and must find something to drink. -2 points per day phase until Lex has left the hills.
Card.Mechanics: -2 Points for each following consecutive day phase spent in a Hills

Card.Name: Midday Storm
Card.Description: Lex is unable to move terrain for the next day phase and discards 1 card.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain next day phase, Discard 1 card

Card.Name: Mushroom Poisoning
Card.Description: All of Lex’s food has mysteriously gone bad and must be discarded, and he doesn’t have enough to sleep here. Lex discards two cards OR Half of Lex’s food has mysteriously gone bad and has to be discarded, -4 points
Card.Mechanics: 50% Discards two cards OR -4 Points, Trigger Dialogue Sequence

Card.Name: Snakebite
Card.Description: Lex is awoken by the faint hiss, too close for comfort. 40% A snake darts out of the bushes and bites Lex! He loses 8 points. 60% Lex anticipates the creature in wait, and conjures a spell to kill it. Earn 4 magic.
Card.Mechanics: 40% Chance -8 Points, 60% +4 Magic

Card.Name: Swamp Hole
Card.Description: Lex’s leg gets caught in a pit of mud.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain until end of day, -2 points per day phase until swamp is left

Card.Name: The Stomach Rumbles
Card.Description: There’s no greater calamity than the one Lex wrought upon that ditch. Lex cannot move terrain during the next day phase, but get 2 points for relieving himself.
Card.Mechanics: Cannot move terrain, +2 Points

Card.Name: Trouble in Trusian Cave
Card.Description: As Lex is in the Trusian cave searching for crystals, he encounters an avalanche of rocks that block his path.The cave spirit Grateria appears to be displeased.
Card.Mechanics: Trigger Dialogue Sequence, -1 Point OR -8 Points and discard two cards

Card.Name: Well Kept House Owners Return
Card.Description: Lex manages to snag a few things on his way out, despite being followed closely by an aggressive broom. +2 Magic for each card in hand. -10 points and additional -5 for each time Well-Kept House was played
Card.Mechanics: -10 Points, +2 Magic for each card in hand
